Removed_Input.purpose: Enhances the typing experience for players using touchscreens.

Added_Physics.name: DFFlagUsePhysicsMeshDecoderInBulletWrapper_Staged
Added_Physics.mechanism: Enables a new method for decoding physics meshes in a bullet wrapper system.
Added_Physics.purpose: Improves the accuracy and performance of physics interactions in games.

Changed_Other.name: DFStringFlagRepoGitHashDynamicString

Changed_Other.purpose: Improves the reliability of updates and features for players.

Changed_Other.name: DFStringFlipTimeStampDynamicString

Changed_Other.purpose: Improves how time is displayed in the game, making it more user-friendly.

Changed_Other.name: FStringFlagRepoGitHashFastString
Changed_Other.mechanism: Optimizes the way version information is stored and accessed.
